Conspire [i](As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it.)[/i]
Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature that conspired to copy Shocking Expose.
